report_title: Open-End Investment Funds in the US
executive_summary: Figures have been adjusted for inflation and are presented in 2024 currency. Revenue for the Open-End Investment Funds industry has been increasing over the five years to 2024. Open-end investment funds revenue has been growing at a CAGR of 0.6% to $176.7 billion over the past five years, including an expected decline of 0.4% in 2024 alone. In the same year, profit is set to fall to 29.4%. Industry revenue has been increasing alongside overall asset growth, despite operators being forced to lower fees to meet shifting consumer preferences.

current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Investors choose open-end investment funds for their exposure to various assets and relatively hands-off approach.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: THE FEDERAL RESERVE INCREASED INTEREST RATES TO CONTROL RAMPANT INFLATION
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Supply chain issues and a global energy crisis created historically high inflation in the latter part of the current period.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: High Interest Rates Affect Investor Behavior
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Higher interest rates are reducing liquidity in the financial markets.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: ETF Dominance to Grow Moving Forward
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Investors will favor the lower costs and liquidity associated with ETFs.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Institutional Investors Will Add More Mutual Funds and ETFs
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Many institutional investors will attempt to invest cash and short-term assets into money-market mutual funds and ETFs.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Investment managers will increase their use of ETFs
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: ETFs enable investment managers to remain fully invested in markets.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Investor Uncertainty Will Decline but Persist During the Outlook Period
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Inflation is still too high, and the Federal Reserve is expected to closely monitor inflation.

industry_definition: This industry comprises legal entities (funds) that earn fees by pooling and investing money, giving the investors rights to a proportional share of the fund performance.
key_trends: The Open-End Investment Funds industry operates with a low level of market share concentration.

market_segmentation.segment_description: Households include individuals that purchase shares in investment companies.

products_and_services.product_description: Money market funds seek to earn interest while maintaining a $1.00 NAV.

business_locations.location_description: The Great Lakes region is the largest region.

FAQs.question: How does your company emphasize the value of its services?
FAQs.answer: Fund operators stress their low fees and historical returns to emphasize value.
